a.title: Go to Louise Independent School District

div.div:
Our Mission: Our students shall be academically prepared to fulfill their potential, self-assured, and motivated to excel.
Our Vision: Educate the Whole Child

408 2nd Street PO BOX 97, Louise, TX 77455
Phone 979-648-2982 | Fax 979-648-2520

Louise ISD is extremely honored and proud to be among the 754 school districts across the nation recognized by The NAMM Foundation as one of the Best Communities for music education!

a.title: Per Governor Abbotts April 17, 2020, order, School classrooms are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

span.strong: Per Governor Abbotts April 17, 2020, order, School classrooms are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

a.title: Per Governor Abbotts April 17, 2020, order, School classrooms are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

span.span: On April 13th the Elementary campus handed out three weeks worth of assignments, and will be due by May 4th. Parents can drop off completed assignments on May 4th @ the Mill in Louise, 7AM to 9AM, or if possible submit completed assignments to teachers through google classroom or email. Contact your teacher or principal if you have questions.

strong.span: Junior High School - Instructional materials are posted or shared online through Google Classroom. Contact your teacher if you have questions.
High School - Instructional materials are posted or shared online.

a.title: Without access to physical book stores, an online book fair becomes a lifeline for parents looking for quality reading and learning material for their children. And a book fair in any form gives families a sense of normalcy as they joyfully browse for books, watch video trailers, and shop online in the safety and comfort of their homes. AVAILABLE SOON!!

span.a: VIRTUAL BOOK FAIR COMING SOON! - 2020 SPRING BOOK FAIR SIZZLE REEL

a.title: Without access to physical book stores, an online book fair becomes a lifeline for parents looking for quality reading and learning material for their children. And a book fair in any form gives families a sense of normalcy as they joyfully browse for books, watch video trailers, and shop online in the safety and comfort of their homes. AVAILABLE SOON!!

span.br:
** To Go Breakfast & Lunch, 6:45 to 9AM, weekdays, for all kids up to 18,
Drive up to the School Cafeteria Entrance, Kids must be with you.
*COVID-19 In Texas (Dashboard)
* Important information from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
*ALL UIL CONTESTS SUSPENDED DUE TO COVID-19
To support the health and safety of our students and communities, the
UIL has suspended ALL UIL sanctioned contests and practices.
*

a.title: By registering for e~Funds for Schools, parents are able to pay online for student meals! You will also have access to your full payment history. Make payments for multiple students in one easy transaction!

img.alt: Click here for more details - LISD now offers online payments for students cafeteria meals!
